questions: _   produces the most apples in the world.
article:
Almost everyone likes to eat apples. Apples grow  in nearly every part of the world. The United States produces  more apples than any other country except France. The states of Washington and New York grow the most apples. New York is on the east coast and Washington is on the west near Canada.
Apples are red, yellow or green. _ Many people like to carry apples to work or to school to eat with their lunches. Most American people are often too busy or too tired to cook, so they often have their lunches very simply. Apple juice is also a popular drink and apple pie is the favorite dessert of many Americans. The state of Washington is proud  of its apples. The trees there produce nearly five billion  apples every year - one apple for every man, woman and child in the whole world.
